frontmatter.title: Enable WiFi Protected Access and WPA2 encryption.
frontmatter.description: Here is a quick guide on enabling these. https://blog.securitybrigade.com/wireless-security-how-to-enable-wep-and-wpa-encryption/ By doing this, you prevent unauthorised users from accessing the information being passed across your network.

frontmatter.title: Set devices to update software automatically
